Interface Interceptor

public interface Interceptor

Representation of an interceptor used by Nanocontainer.

Author:
Matthieu Clochard

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object intercept(javax.interceptor.InvocationContext invocationContext)

Method Detail

intercept

java.lang.Object intercept(javax.interceptor.InvocationContext invocationContext)
Proceed the interception by calling a dynamically defined method.

Parameters:
invocationContext - the context when the interception occurs.
Returns:
the result of the method called.
